org.jcvlib.core

Class FloodFillStruct

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvlib.core.FloodFillStruct

  • public class FloodFillStruct
extends java.lang.Object
    This structure contains some useful statistics about filled field. This is immutable object -- you can not change values of it after creation.
    Author:
    Dmitriy Zavodnikov (d.zavodnikov@gmail.com)

    • Constructor Summary

      FloodFillStruct(int totalFillPixels, Rectangle fillRect, Point centerOfGravity) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Point getCenterMass()
      Return center of mass for filled field.
      Rectangle getFillRect()
      Return rectangle with filled field.
      int getTotalFillPixels()
      Return number of pixels that was filled.
